Text: NARUC th Annual Convention Information NARUC th Annual Convention Philadelphia November Sessions on FERC RTO Policy Update Critical Infrastructure Security Protection of Our Nations Drinking Water National Renewable Energy Policy The Energy Infrastructure What Will It Take to Attract Capital Keynote speakers include FCC Chairman Michael Powell FCC Commissioners The Honorable Kathleen Abernathy Michael Copps Kevin Martin FERC Commissioner The Honorable Nora Mead Brownell Political Humorist Mark Shields Brian Roberts President and CEO of Comcast CLE Credit has been granted by states visit webpage for listing Visit Meetingsannualconvindexhtml for more information a list of current registrants a complete listing of sessions speakers and exhibitors or to register Save money PreRegistration Ends Friday October
